Why is now good timing for your business?

Self-custody is a huge headwind. People are losing trust in institutions, and want to take control of their investments. Weâ€™re at the early onset of an unprecedented transformation in digital payments, investing, and capital formation. An early lead in asset aggregation will be very sticky over the next 5-10 years.
